1297520.name: Animal Liberation Squad
1297520.description:
This game is on hold: Learn more here


---

Lead a team of activists, rescue animals, break expensive machinery, graffiti walls and celebrate with vegan food at the Twisted Almond.

Features

  • Become the beloved leader of the first underground animal activism team of Red Lake!
  • Sneak your way into Red Lake's Meat Industry Corporation. But be careful, animals don't feel like being rescued at all!
  • You can't hurt anyone, you'll have to be clever on how you get rid of those pesky guards.
  • Rescue animals and bring them to a sanctuary for a happy life. You get to name them too!
  • Break the hell out of expensive machinnery and leave your mark on those clean walls.
  • Take pictures of animal abuse and release them to the world.
  • Digitally taste the finest vegan and gluten-free foods at Twisted Almond (you may get lucky and get some recipes!).
1297520.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
